contentrichtext.text: {{merge to|Ford Super Duty|discuss=Talk:Ford Super Duty#Proposed merge with Ford F-550|date=July 2013}} {{multiple issues| {{unreferenced|date=November 2012}} {{update|date=November 2012}} }} {| border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" align="right" width="250" style="margin:0 0 1em 1em" |----- | colspan="2" bgcolor="#336633" align="center" | |----- | Country Of Origin: || [[United States]] |----- | Designation: || F Series Class 5 |----- | Configuration: || Chassis Cab |----- | Manufacturer: | Ford Motor Company |----- | Specifications: || MY2013 |----- | Length: || 226.0" - 286.0" |----- | Width: || 95.2" |----- | Height: || 79.3" - 79.6" |----- | Wheel Base: || 141.0" - 201.0" |----- | Ground Clearance: || 7.9" (Minimum) |----- | Weight: || 6,353 lbs - 7,164 lbs |----- | Payload: || 17,950 lbs - 19,000 lbs |----- | Towing: || 16,000 lbs |----- |Power plants: || 400 [[horsepower|HP]] 6.7L Turbocharged 3-valve Powerstroke Diesel V8<br> 362 [[horsepower|HP]] 6.8L 3-valve Triton V10 |----- |} The '''Ford F550''' is a class 5 [[Ford Motor Company|Ford]] conventional [[truck]]. Its configuration is unique in its weight class in that the model shares fenders, hood and grille as well as the cab with a pickup model. 2005 and later models have a wide track front axle, with Gray plastic fender and bumper extensions (shared with the F450) that made the trucks much easier to maneuver in tight spots. GVW's up to 19,500# are offered, also a 35,000# GCWR towing package is offered. New for 2011 is a 6.7 liter Ford built Powerstroke diesel engine. The 6.8 liter V10 gas engine is a carryover for 2011. ==Models== * XL * XLT * Lariat ==Model Specs== XL: 6.8L Gasoline [[Ford Modular Engine]] [[V10 engine]], 5-speed [[automatic transmission]], 19.5" tires, dual rear wheels, steel wheels, black front fascia, A/M-F/M radio with two speakers, heater and blower, vinyl [[bench seat]] or seats, manual roll-up windows, manual door locks, power steering, [[Anti-lock braking system|ABS]], front [[headlamps]] and [[fog lamps]], 19,500 pound [[Gross Vehicle Weight Rating]] XLT (adds): Chrome front fascia, A/M-F/M radio with [[cassette player]] or [[CD player]] with [[MP3]] playback capabilities and four speakers, [[air conditioning]], cloth [[bench seat]] or seats, power windows, power door locks, [[keyless entry]] Lariat (adds): Chrome wheel skins, A/M-F/M radio with [[cassette player]] and/or [[CD player]] with [[MP3]] playback capabilities, [[Ford Sync]] System (on later models), heated leather [[bench seat]] or seats ==Engines== *6.8L V10 (Gas) (1999- ) *6.0L [[Power Stroke]] Turbo V8 (Diesel) (2003-2007) (Discontinued due to replacement engine, succeeded by 6.4L [[Power Stroke]] Turbo V8 (Diesel) ) *6.2L V8 (Gas) (2010- ) *6.4L [[Power Stroke]] Turbo V8 (Diesel) (2008-2010) (Discontinued due to replacement engine, succeeded by 6.7L [[Power Stroke]] Turbo V8 (Diesel) ) (International-built) *6.7L [[Power Stroke]] Turbo V8 (Diesel) (2011- ) (In-house [[Ford]] built) *7.3L [[Power Stroke]] Turbo V8 (Diesel) (1999-2002) (Discontinued due to stricter emissions regulations, succeeded by 6.0L [[Power Stroke]] Turbo V8 (Diesel) ) (International-built [[T444]] ) ==Transmissions== *Five-Speed Automatic (1999-2010) *Six-Speed Automatic for Gasoline Engines (2011- ) *Six-Speed Automatic for Diesel Engines (2011- ) *Six-Speed Manual (1999-2009) ==See also== * [[Ford F Series]] * [[Ford F250]] * [[Ford F350]] * [[Ford F Series|Ford F450]] * [[Terradyne Armored Vehicles Inc. GURKHA|Gurkha armored vehicle based on Ford F550 chassis]] {{improve categories|date=November 2012}} [[Category:Ford vehicles|F-550]] [[Category:2000s automobiles]] {{Modern-auto-stub}}
